metadata.title: CVE-2022-4492 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The undertow client is not checking the server identity presented by theserver certificate in https connections. This is a compulsory step (atleast it should be performed by default) in https and in http/2. I wouldadd it to any TLS client protocol.

criterions.comment: undertow package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
